Reviews.Title: one of the best phone's  ever
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Hello 2 all d phone lovers out there I'm just gonna b short. I have bought d HTC vivid 2mths ago an what I expected of the phone I got way more than I bargained 4. Time would fail me 2 say how much this phone challenges the best of phones an wins. Just keep in mine with a gr8 phone comes poor battery but with an extended battery the phone again wins d Grammy........ Thanks HTC

Reviews.Title: this phone said it was new and it was actually used i'm returning it, is a shame because i actually love the phone
Reviews.Author: Daylin
Reviews.Content: the packaging and everything looked new, but when i opened everything , the phone was dirty, it had dents, it was obviously used. I'm very disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: MDias
Reviews.Content: This phone competes with the best of them.Large screen ,sleek look,full hd camera ,camcorder etc...includes beats auto all is u need is the headphones if u have them like I do the sound is better ! Battery not so great but it will last a full day of work 9 hours sometimes into the night lightly using it..

Reviews.Title: its an at&t; phone unlocked and sold
Reviews.Author: girish
Reviews.Content: this seller is a fraud. he sent me a phone which was at&t; phone and he unlocked it and sold it to me. the phone is new but was not originally unlocked phone. the serial number on the phone and on the box was different and this is how i figured out. also the manual provided was not original and photocopied and sold in the box. doesn't have the complete info on operation. crap .dont buy the products from such people.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT USED PHONE
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: This phone is practically perfect only 4 TINY little nicks on metal batter cover I can't even believe I saw it , the screen has not a scratch or smudge , better than I expected I'd def suggest this seller ...I ordered it Wednesday got it that Saturday !

Reviews.Title: Awful.
Reviews.Author: checkmate
Reviews.Content: The phone battery doesn't stay charged.  When you hit the home button it takes a pic.  Awful phone and can't return it.

Reviews.Title: HTC VIVID  cellphone not satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Joyce Ward
Reviews.Content: I hd an HTC Vivid prior to the recent new purchase.  I was so happy with my older Vivid that I wanted another one like  it.  But, since I have had my new Vivid a few  weeks, I  have  really been disappointed with it.  First, I find out that Google  has  a monopoly  on all games and tells me which games I can download and play.  Google also insists that I  allow them total access to my personal information and a complete list of my contacts before they will allow me to play a game.  They also will not allow downloads from other websites to my phone.  I either have to give them complete access to my personal info or I must purchase the full game in order to play without  ads.  I will not compromise my family and friends, so I haven't been able to play any games on the Vivid, which sucks.  I  had decided  to keep  the  Vivid and use it anyway, but then the charger stopped working. My PC will not recognize the Vivid, so I cannot charge it  or transfer photos to my PC.  There appears too be a loose connection in the usb port.  I am returning the Vivid and will purchase a  different  brand.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sturf"
Reviews.Content: My new phone is slim, flat and very convienient to hold. I love it. I even bought a black one for my sister....better than anyother phone i ever bought

Reviews.Title: Was worth Every cent !
Reviews.Author: carmen pena
Reviews.Content: It really feels solid phone. I like the brightness on the screen. It was delived in a timely manner, with great cusyomer service.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: jewel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone last April  and I was very disappointed with it . It worked fine for the first few months then it started to have battery and charging problems. By January I  had purchased five different chargers over a period of few months because after a few weeks the phone would not charge unless it was connected to a different/new  charger . Finally the phone refused to charge with any charging device so I bought a new battery thinking that , that would solve the problem but it did not and I was left without a phone for about a month and a half . Eventually I had to a purchase a new phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: AnnuvinX
Reviews.Content: I love how fast this phone is, and its ability to run tons of apps at the same time with no lag. I run Spotify constantly, and it's a memory hog; no lag whatsoever. I also had no problem in getting this phone to work with the StraightTalk network.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT SELLER
Reviews.Author: Jean Modeste
Reviews.Content: This cellphone works very good but it was not the one that I was looking for. This cellphone has everything that you want.

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Festus Lamin
Reviews.Content: It was very good and i want to get the black one for my wife and i know she will love it too.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Happy!
Reviews.Author: CuteQball
Reviews.Content: I bought the HTC Vivid 4G LTE. Has a great OS and screen is quite large. This phone is flawless. I love it. I had an issue with the phone when I first got it, but the seller was very fast and honest about helping me. In no time the phone was 100% and so was my trust in this seller. Would happily recommend this seller to friends solely on their integrity. Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Same specs as the Samsung Galaxy II
Reviews.Author: Ohio Reader "Ohio"
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone when you compare the specs with a Samsung Galaxy II.  They are identical!  Nice big screen with the HTC Sense UI which I have grown to love.  Very quick performance!  My only complaint is the battery doesn't last as long as some other HTC phones I've owned.  Otherwise excellent phone!

Reviews.Title: TOO COOL GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: MR J...
Reviews.Content: NICE PRICE COOL PHONE LOVING IT NO PROBLEMS SO FAR  LOVE THE CAMERA AND VIDEO MY PHONE GOT HERE A DAY EARLIER TRACKING WAS ON TIME.....EVERYONE SHOULD CHECK THIS PHONE ( HTC VIVID 4G UNLOCKED ) YOU WILL LOVE IT TOO....

Reviews.Title: this
Reviews.Author: Lawanda Davis
Reviews.Content: this phone do not work hardly it only stay charge for a few hours sometimes mintues very poor signal will not be getting another vivid ant time soon

Reviews.Title: not the final battery i was cheated
Reviews.Author: vivenne simpson
Reviews.Content: The battery is not an original HTC battery. It is swollen charged for for over 24 hours and after one hour it shuts off.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Hannah
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone! It does not look or feel cheap. The operating system runs smoothly. No problems this far!!

Reviews.Title: HTC VIVID
Reviews.Author: Cynthia guerrero
Reviews.Content: The phone had some issues but in overall its a very great phone, fast, good camera quality and I really like the design.

Reviews.Title: HTC Vivid
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Payne
Reviews.Content: Phone works wellBattery gets warm is my only complaint.I am satisfied thus far.The phone was in the condition as described

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Wis
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for less then a month!  I have issues with the headphone jack and the battery life is very short!  Last night I tried charging it and it would not charge and would give me an error message saying the device could not charge! This is so frustrating!

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Maritza Bartoli
Reviews.Content: I'am upset and dissapointed, this product is new and not working touchscreen correctly and it has sound problems, I don't recommend this product or the seller...

Reviews.Title: Horribly dissappointed!!
Reviews.Author: Irene Martin
Reviews.Content: I ordered dispite reading all the bad reviews! They were all true.  This is a branded ATT phone that does not work with Family Mobile - you can get calls, but don't expect to use data./internet/e-mail or other network features!!  Also, mine was not new,  box was in terrible shape etc.

Reviews.Title: system shut down
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Three weeks into being used by a relative I had bought it for abroad, it blacked out. Showed nothing but HTC white screen. Disappointed

Reviews.Title: False advertising.
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: I don't believe any of the "unlocked" cellphones are actually unlocked on Amazon. It's a trick. Simple as that. This is my second time buying a cellphone off of Amazon and it wasn't unlocked. I want a refund and I'll be glad to give the phone back, because it's under AT&T; and I have T-Mobile. Never buying a phone off of the internet again.

Reviews.Title: Will NEVER purchase HTC again.
Reviews.Author: MoraRocks
Reviews.Content: BAD ANTENNA, BAD SPEAKER. JUNK PHONE! have had problems with absolutely every HTC phone i have owned. I am not PLEASED

Reviews.Title: Kudos to BREED/Amazon
Reviews.Author: rich johnson
Reviews.Content: We had a problem with our phone.  I contacted BREED and they handled it fast, efficiently, all around excellent!I would buy from them again in a second...Rich J

Reviews.Title: Rating - 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Jsweet2157
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my daughter's birthday.  She seem to likes it.  Thank you.  Have a good day.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: steve morrell
Reviews.Content: great product fast shipped great phone this is a very good phone very fast internet easy to use and great looking phone

Reviews.Title: htc vivivd 16GB very fast,smooth,heavy duty,i recommend it to you"
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: I bought it because htc quality,large screen, color,memoryAfter use i like it more because its very fast,smooth,heavy dutyAfter upateThe Vivid is a fabulous phone for my needs which are basic internet browsing for a few hours a day and occasional game-playing; the only thing that points me is the battery life, but I was told this is very common among all smartphones,

Reviews.Title: has a lot of defects
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: this product is rip off because it has defects and is not an unlocked version phone it's at&t; and it's unlocked and take forever to charge it sucks

Reviews.Title: QUIETLY BRILLIANT
Reviews.Author: ChelleKra1 "Chelleshopamazon mania"
Reviews.Content: beautiful phone takes great pics. Loving the long term evolution(lte).This phone is a real phone. except when the phone rings it goes silent tried to fix but i guess thats the quietly brilliant HTC

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: elizabeth leonard
Reviews.Content: It is awesome.  Love everything about it.  I would order this again.  I would also recommend this to a friend

Reviews.Title: I got a damaged and used phone
Reviews.Author: lawrish
Reviews.Content: The phone was advertised as new. When I got it I realized the camera lens was scratched, there was evidence of an internal sticker that had been peeled off, the water damaged sensor was pink and part peeled off, showing that there had been water damaged. I'm processing the return, but the tax money I paid for it (20%, ouch) I'll never see back. Do yourself a favour, go buy it somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this phone
Reviews.Author: Yoana
Reviews.Content: I usually don't write product reviews but this time i am pissed off.The package arrived on time as it was expected.However the box was opened!!There was no air bags in it to protect it from damage.It was wrapped only with a damaged box.No tape nothing.Everybody was able to open the box change the item and no one would be able to notice that.The phone box was opened too which reminds me that somebody had play with the phone.I was ready to return the item at the moment that arrived at home but i decided to give it a try.The first charging was 12 hours and the battery wasn't still charged at 100 percent.I thought it's because it's new but nah...It was f***ed up..After these 12 hours i finally had a chance to try what i purchased.I was impressed.No lag at all but that was the only think that i liked.The phones is pretty solid and heavy.It feels like i have two devices in my pocket.And after 2 hours of usage i've noticed that the battery drained wit 40 percent which is ridiculous.For 6 hours it was fully drained and then another 12 hours of charging.The price was too good but the device was awful.Don't waste your money on it!

Reviews.Title: htc vivid x710a great cellphone.
Reviews.Author: Rosita, Florida
Reviews.Content: I rated it a 5 because the cellphone HTC Vivid X710a is definitely a great phone, I have a Iphone5, and believe me, I preferred the HTC Vivid...it has everything the I phone 5 have, but better because it has at the bottom the back icon and  so easy to return to the page before...the Iphone5 has just one button that take you back to start all over again if you make a mistake...bad.

Reviews.Title: Does this item come with anything when mailed?
Reviews.Author: Harper
Reviews.Content: I gave it a three star because I haven't got it just yet. I'm hoping to real soon. But does anyone know if the phone comes with anything? I mean he doesn't mention anything about a charger or anything like that. So information would be nice :) - Harper

Reviews.Title: Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Brian Andrew McHardy ll
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone because my old phone died and needed a new one, I enjoyed it for 2 days, but the  third day the phone stopped working. I't won't cut on n I'm highly bothered. Can i send this back for a replacement??

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: vivian
Reviews.Content: I gave this rating a ONE STAR for not being able to fulfill the order in the timely matter. I disappointed that it is an Amazon Prime offering, and I even paid the extra fee to get this item in one business day. I ordered this item on Wednesday evening, paid for the extra fast shipping, hoping to get this item by Friday....Friday, I checked online for the tracking status....I received comments that the item was not yet shipped and it might be sometimes in February before I get the item...sadly, i needed this phone ASAP. I canceled my order. For ONE STAR for their undeliverable even though they say the order is eligible for Prime.

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked
Reviews.Author: D. Hollingsworth "Hiking addict"
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived on time as stated and in good condition, but my grouse is that it was not unlocked as I was made to believed.....

Reviews.Title: replaced the phone I broke the screen on.
Reviews.Author: Randy Smith
Reviews.Content: Like the phone , it has some issues with it but it will do till my contract is up..Works just like my last phone.

Reviews.Title: No 4G service in my area
Reviews.Author: Prophetess Diana Francis
Reviews.Content: I wasn't aware that I couldn't get the 4G service in my area and the talking/ sound quality is not good.

ProductInfo.Features:
The HTC Vivid is a feature-packed Android smartphone with super-fast 4G LTE data speed, and a gorgeous 4.5-inch SuperLCD display
Other features include 1.2 GHz dual-core processor, 16 GB internal storage, 8 megapixel camera with 1080p HD video recording, and front-facing camera
The Vivid also features WiFi, multi-format music player, HTC Sense software, mobile hotspot, microSD memory card slot, and GPS navigation
This device is equipped with quad-band GSM and WCDMA modes for international use - GSM 850/900/1800/1900 - LTE 700/1700 - WCDMA 850/1900/2100
Use this Android smartphone to access thousands of apps, games, books, movies, and music on Google's Play Store
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Vivid X710a 16GB Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 2.3 OS, Dual-Core, 4.5" S-LCD Touchscreen (HTC Sense UI), 8MP Camera + Secondary 1.3MP Camera, Video, GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, FM Radio, MP3/MP4 Player, SNS Integration, Google Apps and microSD Slot - White
